title: Tempest
data:

**Tempest** is an [artifact weapon](/wiki/Artifact_weapon "Artifact weapon") that appears in [EvilHack](/wiki/EvilHack "EvilHack"). It is [unaligned](/wiki/Unaligned "Unaligned"), and its [base item](/wiki/Base_item "Base item") is a [halberd](/wiki/Halberd "Halberd").

## Generation

Tempest can only be created by combining [Mjollnir](/wiki/Mjollnir "Mjollnir") and [Cleaver](/wiki/Cleaver "Cleaver") at a [forge](/wiki/Forge_\(dungeon_feature\) "Forge (dungeon feature)") - it cannot be wished for, and will revert to its base item if left in a [bones](/wiki/Bones "Bones") file.

## Description

Tempest has +1d10 [to-hit](/wiki/To-hit "To-hit") and deals +1d24 damage to monsters without [shock resistance](/wiki/Shock_resistance "Shock resistance"), causing lightning to strike them - when [pounding](/wiki/Pounding "Pounding") with Tempest, attacking in melee while [riding](/wiki/Riding "Riding") or attacking in melee as a [centaur](/wiki/Centaur_\(starting_race\) "Centaur (starting race)"), there is also a 1⁄5 chance of creating a 3x3 explosion of lightning centered on the target monster. While wielded, Tempest confers [shock resistance](/wiki/Shock_resistance "Shock resistance") and [stun resistance](/index.php?title=Stun_resistance\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "Stun resistance (page does not exist)"), and protects items in the wielder's inventory from shock damage.

## Encyclopedia entry

At this hour, lie at my mercy all mine enemies.

\[ The Tempest, William Shakespeare ]

- *This page is a **[stub](/wiki/Category:Stubs "Category:Stubs")**. Should you wish to do so, you can contribute by [**expanding this page**.](https://nethackwiki.com/index.php?title=Tempest\&action=edit)*

Tempest

From NetHackWiki
Jump to navigation Jump to search
)   Tempest    
Base item halberd
Damage vs. small 1d10 +1d24
Damage vs. large 2d6 +1d24
To-hit bonus +1d10
Bonus versus non-shock resistant
Weapon skill polearms
Size one-handed
Affiliation
  • intelligent artifacts
  • forged artifacts
When carried

(none)

When wielded
  • shock resistance
  • stun resistance
  • protects inventory from shock damage
  • lightning on hit
    1⁄5 chance of lightning explosion
When invoked
  • toggles conflict
Base price 20000 zm
Weight 150
Material iron

Tempest is an artifact weapon that appears in EvilHack. It is unaligned, and its base item is a halberd.

Generation

Tempest can only be created by combining Mjollnir and Cleaver at a forge - it cannot be wished for, and will revert to its base item if left in a bones file.

Description

Tempest has +1d10 to-hit and deals +1d24 damage to monsters without shock resistance, causing lightning to strike them - when pounding with Tempest, attacking in melee while riding or attacking in melee as a centaur, there is also a 1⁄5 chance of creating a 3x3 explosion of lightning centered on the target monster. While wielded, Tempest confers shock resistance and stun resistance, and protects items in the wielder's inventory from shock damage.

Encyclopedia entry

At this hour, lie at my mercy all mine enemies.

[ The Tempest, William Shakespeare ]

This page is a stub. Should you wish to do so, you can contribute by expanding this page.
